      • streamingContains

        public static int streamingContains(InputStream input,
                    String charset,
                    String... contains)
                             throws IOException
        Checks if inputstream contains a set of strings. Only one will be found.
        Parameters:
        input - inputstream to be checked
        charset - encoding charset
        contains - array of strings to check if inputstream contains
        Returns:
        index of found contains, or -1 if none
        Throws:
        IOException
